title: Our Immune Response to Vaccines: a Conversation with MSU Immunologist Kathy Hoag
description: Dr. Kathy Hoag discusses how the immune system works, how vaccines help to build immunity, and how our bodies respond to natural infection from viruses like COVID-19.
cleaned_text: Our Immune Response to Vaccines: a Conversation with MSU Immunologist Kathy Hoag September 30, 2022 Learn more about how vaccines work and how they impact our body's immune response as we speak with immunologist and certified medical laboratory scientist Dr. Kathy Hoag from Michigan State University's Biomedical Laboratory Diagnostics Program. Dr. Hoag discusses how the immune system works, how vaccines help to build immunity, and how our bodies respond to natural infection from viruses like COVID-19. This webinar was recorded
